name: The Null Slumber
description:
This game was created for Harold Jam 2023: Ascent of the Allies.

*Credits are inside the "CREDITS LIST" text file inside the game's folder.

-- -- --

Harold, a famous hero from the world of Emvi (known as MV), has had a habit of inviting heroes from other worlds to come venture with him in his world. This time, a strange castle has suddenly appeared in MV, and Harold wants to gather a crew from across the worlds check it out.

Several database, cover-art, and other Run-Time Package characters seem to have answered Harold's latest summon. Climb up the odd castle, solve its mysteries, and maybe find the red-haired hero along the way, with a variety of characters from the RPG Maker series.

Notes:

  • Demo playtime: 30-40 minutes
  • Combo-based battle system.
  • Node-based dungeon crawling.
  • 9 playable characters (in final version), each with their own unique skillsets, motivations, and interactions.
  • you know me i always got that character banter
